trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control that change the position of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 中的事件提供資料<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>變更的註解位置的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs class is used for the two annotation-positioning events, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>, in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs 類別使用的兩個註解位置的事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>，請在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A> property gets the annotation object that is being positioned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A>屬性會取得正在位於附註物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class also contains properties that retrieve the new location, width, height and anchor location of the annotation that is repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別也包含擷取新的位置、 寬度、 高度和錨點位置重新定位之註解的內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs>類別</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The Annotation property allows the developer to set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation> properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: 附註屬性可讓開發人員設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation>屬性期間<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new anchor location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的新錨點位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that represents the new anchor position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref>物件，表示新的錨點位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new annotation anchor point X location.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定新的註解錨點的 X 位置。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> events are raised, the NewAnchorLocationX property determines the new X coordinate of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>引發事件，NewAnchorLocationX 屬性會決定新的註解的 X 座標。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information is useful when the annotation is newly anchored to a data point.
trans-unit.target: 當新的資料點錨定註解，則此資訊會非常實用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new annotation anchor point X location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>值，表示新的註解錨點的 X 位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new annotation anchor point Y location.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定新的註解錨點的 Y 位置。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewAnchorLocationY property determines the new Y coordinate of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>引發事件，NewAnchorLocationY 屬性會決定新的 Y 座標，註解。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information is useful when the annotation is newly anchored to a data point.
trans-unit.target: 當新的資料點錨定註解，則此資訊會非常實用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value representing the new annotation anchor point Y location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>值，表示新的註解錨點的 Y 位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new X coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定新的 X 座標的註解的位置。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewLocationX property defines the X-coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>引發事件，NewLocationX 屬性定義的註解的 X 座標位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new X coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>值，表示新的註解的座標位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new Y coordinate of the annotation location.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解位置的新 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewLocationY property defines the Y-coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>引發事件，NewLocationY 屬性定義的註解的 Y 座標位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new Y coordinate of the annotation location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>表示註解位置的新 Y 座標值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new location and size of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的大小與新的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的新高度。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, use the NewSizeHeight property to determine the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>引發事件，請使用 NewSizeHeight 屬性來判斷新的註解高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information can be used when you resize the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 當您調整附註，可以使用這項資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>值，表示新的註解高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的新的寬度。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, use the NewSizeWidth property to determine the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>引發事件，請使用 NewSizeWidth 屬性來判斷新的註解的寬度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information can be used when you resize the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 當您調整附註，可以使用這項資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>值，表示新註解的寬度。
